txt.en: DNT - 'Good work! We shall drive them all from our ancestral home!'
'Oh, hoo! I see the stench of the crystals has not improved. Let us see what you have brought.'
Mother Amma is in Stókkset, in Clovengap.\n\nYou should bring the crystal sarrowstone sample to Mother Amma.
Crystal-encrusted Wargs can be found in south-western Clovengap.\n\nMother Amma has asked for you to defeat crystal-encrusted Wargs and to bring her crystal samples.
'Foul creatures. Gundabad is no home for them!'

'Welcome to Stókkset, friend. There is much work to be done. I had hoped that the crystals we destroyed in Elderslade were the only ones, but scouts in Clovengap bring reports of Wargs and other creatures with the fell sarrowstones embedded in their very skin!\n\n'Defeat what abominations you come across, and bring me samples of their crystals. I fear we may be dealing with something new… something far more dangerous.'
Mother Amma suspects the corruption uncovered in Elderslade has spread to Clovengap.
